entry.p: Wow, today was my first day of work at Jabber.com. This is really a dream job for me, since I get to work on Jabber all day. I've been helping out with the Jabber project on the open-source side of things (i.e., jabber.org) since last December, so it's awesome to be working on it full-time. Special thanks to Harry Grout for letting me move upstairs!
